hiveArticle.title: Streetphotography Contest in #steemitphotochallenge - Entry1 - Not so lonely street
hiveArticle.body:
This is my first entry to steemitphotochallenge contest organised by @jamtaylor 

**Theme - STREET PHOTOGRAPHY**

**Name of the Picture - Not so lonely street** 

This picture was taken on my recent visit to [Yercaud](https://steemit.com/travel/@codingdefined/few-pictures-of-my-recent-yercaud-travel), Its actually a hill station where a lot of people come on weekends. It was taken from a DSLR camera but its not modified at all. 

![_DSC0164.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUG9dtZppnvuYk9oJjftxsxtdBs7BuJqiKos8iyEk5yxn/_DSC0164.jpg) 

# Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined
